entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 6.5°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: 1.4°C
Wind: W 24 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain and a few flurries beginning in the evening then changing to snow after midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
